verses.text: \w The|strong="H3588"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Hear, O Lord, \w my|strong="H8104"\w* justice: \w attend|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* supplication. \w Give|strong="H8104"\w* ear unto \w my|strong="H8104"\w* prayer, which proceedeth \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H8104"\w* deceitful lips.

Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment come forth \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thy countenance: let thy eyes behold \w the|strong="H0559"\w* things \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* equitable.

Thou hast proved \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* visited \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* night, thou hast tried \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* fire: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* iniquity hath \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* found \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H0834"\w*.

That \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w speak|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w works|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* men: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sake|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5375"\w* kept hard ways.
Perfect thou \w my|strong="H3068"\w* goings \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy paths: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* footsteps \w be|strong="H3068"\w* not moved.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0637"\w* cried \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thou, O God, hast heard \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: O incline thy ear unto \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* hear \w my|strong="H5921"\w* words.
Shew forth thy wonderful mercies; thou \w who|strong="H0834"\w* savest \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee.

\w From|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5048"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* resist thy \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* keep \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* apple \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy eye. Protect \w me|strong="H5048"\w* \w under|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy wings.

\w From|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* face \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* wicked \w who|strong="H1523"\w* \w have|strong="H0637"\w* afflicted \w me|strong="H8055"\w*. \w My|strong="H3651"\w* enemies \w have|strong="H0637"\w* surrounded \w my|strong="H3651"\w* soul:
\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* shut \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* fat: \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* hath spoken proudly.

\w They|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* cast \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* now \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* set \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes bowing \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth.
They have taken me, as a lion prepared for the prey; and as a young lion dwelling in secret places.
Arise, O Lord, disappoint him and supplant him; deliver my soul from the wicked one: thy sword

From the enemies of thy hand. O Lord, divide them from the few of the earth in their life: their belly is filled from thy hidden stores. They are full of children: and they have left to their little ones the rest of their substance.
But as for me, I will appear before thy sight in justice: I shall be satisfied when thy glory shall appear.
